page.title: 09CHURCHES IN OUR D-BLOCK
page.content: In our block there are two very interesting old churches and one new chapel-of-ease.{St.Mary's}is the Parish Church and it was built in l862 and is a listed bulding.The tower is a copy of one in France and you can see it from all over Wythall.There is a big congregation with sunday school and singing groups.The Church Hall was a school from 1840 until 1965. The {Baptist Church}was a candle factory until l840 when it was made a church.It is lovely and light & airy inside.The organ is old and comp licated and is up in a balcony.The {Catholic church}is the chapel really. It has not got a graveyard so it shares with St.Mary's.The people have spent a lot of money on restoration and building.Before there was a house to have holy services in.{Meadow Green
